messages.title: Gweithio dros ein cymuned
messages.content: Improving healthcare in North Wales, advocating for rural communities, focusing on education and the economy.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Health care improvements in North Wales
keyPolicies.policyDescription: A commitment to delivering better local health services and access to the best possible treatments and drugs.
Addressing the unique needs of rural communities, focusing on issues such as broadband, public services, and farming.
Steps to build a strong economy with good jobs, better wages, and a skilled workforce.

issues.economy: Building a strong economy with good jobs and better wages, alongside creating opportunities for young people and skilled workers.
issues.education: Ensuring the availability of good schools and fighting to improve standards of education in Wales.
issues.health: Improving healthcare services in North Wales and ensuring access to the best treatments and drugs.

images.caption: Brynle Williams with supporters, involved in discussions and activities related to his campaign.

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet emphasizes local improvements and support, particularly for rural areas and health services. The provided information is promotional and does not offer specific details on experience or endorsements.
